comment.author: 45322615@N00
comment._content:
Hallo,
all the photo you put in "Toscanella" place is the old name for Tuscania, next to Viterbo, in Italy.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi franfiorini,

We pick up caption descriptions from the labels on the lantern slides and these slides date from 1895, which probably predates the modern name. We will add the contemporary name to our records. 

Thanks, 

Angie, Brooklyn Museum Archives
